description:
ðŸ“‹ CopyDesk â€“ Smart Clipboard

CopyDesk helps you save, organize, and manage text you copy or write â€” all in one clean, distraction-free space.

Instead of losing important snippets, links, or messages, CopyDesk lets you capture text intentionally and keep everything neatly organized with tags and categories.

---

âœ¨ What CopyDesk does

â€¢ Save copied text  
When you copy text and open CopyDesk, itâ€™s captured and saved so you can use it later.

â€¢ Add your own snippets  
Create snippets manually anytime. Type or paste text directly into the app and save it just like a note.

â€¢ Organize with tags  
Tag your clips to group related content and find things faster.

â€¢ Categories for better structure  
Use categories like OTPs, Links, Bank, Code, or create your own to keep everything organized.

â€¢ Edit and manage clips  
Edit text, add titles, pin important clips, or mark sensitive content.

â€¢ Smart actions  
Quickly copy text, open links, call phone numbers, send emails, open maps, or share content based on what you saved.

â€¢ Clean and focused design  
A calm, reader-style layout that keeps your attention on your content, not clutter.

---

ðŸ”’ Privacy-first by design

â€¢ Clipboard content is captured only when you open the app  
â€¢ No background clipboard access  
â€¢ No hidden services  
â€¢ Your data stays on your device

---

ðŸŽ¯ Designed for everyday use

CopyDesk is useful for:
â€¢ Links and addresses  
â€¢ Work notes and snippets  
â€¢ Code fragments  
â€¢ Frequently reused text  

Whether you save copied content or write your own snippets, CopyDesk keeps everything organized and easy to access.

---

ðŸ§  Simple, powerful, and intentional

CopyDesk focuses on one thing â€” making text easier to save, organize, and reuse.
